_meta.source: Researched from Jordan tourism and cruise port guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Aqaba city, Red Sea coast, access to Petra and Wadi Rum

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Petra
transit_routes.note: Most popular excursion. Book full day to explore properly.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Wadi Rum
transit_routes.note: Mars-like desert landscape. Combine with jeep tour.

transit_routes.name: Taxi in Aqaba
transit_routes.note: For exploring the city and beaches.

featured_experiences.name: Petra Day Trip
featured_experiences.note: One of the New Seven Wonders of the World. Entry ~$70. Start early.

featured_experiences.name: Wadi Rum Desert
featured_experiences.note: Jeep tours explore this stunning desert wilderness.

featured_experiences.name: Red Sea Diving
featured_experiences.note: Some of the world's best accessible diving directly from shore.
